name: Get to the Toilet
description:
First game I have ever made. You are a piece or poop trying to get to a toilet.

This game has a deep personal connection to myself, I think it represents the way the poops find their way outside of a toilet, and when that happens it is essential that they get back INTO a toilet.  Really, it's an examination of everyday life and how we are all doomed to die at some point or another...

CAN YOU GET TO THE TOILET?!?! Find out in this gripping adventure.
